context_bundle.summary: Framework for predicting social responses to fringe concepts. Three buckets: dismissal cope, glazed eyes no framework, genuine unsettlement. The prediction IS the demonstration - modeling responses before they occur.

onboarding.quick_start: Three response buckets to fringe concepts: 1) Dismissal - 'just word prediction' cope, 2) Glazed eyes - no framework to receive concepts, 3) Genuine unsettlement - realizes something weird is happening. Silence is also data. First response sets room tone. Prediction before reaction proves the modeling.
common_patterns: Loud dismissal gives permission to move on
known_errors: The smarter in niche domains, the smaller the pool who'll volley
